data.meta_site_name: Robert Gavora Fine and Rare Books
data.text:
Heinlein, Robert A.

I WILL FEAR NO EVIL

Boston: Gregg Press, 1978. First edition thus, first printing. Hardcover. Item #44805

ISBN: 0839824491

"First Printing, December 1978" noted on the copyright page. New introduction by Paul Williams. Gregg Press published mainly for the library trade. Relatively few copies were offered for sale retail. Bound in original dark red buckram. Tiny tear to the edge of page 313, else a fine copy, issued without dust jacket.
